comments.content:
From [\*\*\* Type ID Board — How to post a sample or image \*\*\*](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124053/http:/typophile.com/node/18067):  
_Mind the size — don’t post unnecessary big images and do not exceed **600 pixels** in width._

Maybe try to post a sample that’s a little more adapted to the size of the average monitor next time. 1600 pixels is a wee bit much. ;^)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021124053im_/http:/typophile.com/files/B00020HBZA_3650.01._SS500_SCLZZZZZZZ_.jpg)
Looks like DIN with a slab serif at the D.
